sentences.en: Frank was a genuinely friendly sort.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克属于真诚友善的那一类人.

sentences.en: He genuinely loved and cherished her.
sentences.cn: 他由衷地爱恋并珍惜她。
他真心实意地感到懊悔。

sentences.en: He was very true, genuinely square in his relations to those about him.
sentences.cn: 他很诚实, 对周围的人极为公正.

sentences.en: In the centuries following Christ's death, Christians genuinely believed the world was about to end.
sentences.cn: 在耶稣死后的几个世纪里，基督徒们真的相信世界将要灭亡。

sentences.en: Only the opening sequence could claim to be genuinely innovatory.
sentences.cn: 只有开场片段能称得上是真正的创新。

sentences.en: She appeared genuinely surprised by this gesture of affection.
sentences.cn: 看来她真的被这个爱意的表示惊呆了.

sentences.en: She seems genuinely fond of the children.
sentences.cn: 她似乎真的喜欢这些小孩.

sentences.en: She was genuinely angered at his impolite words.
sentences.cn: 听到他粗鲁的话,她可真动火了.

sentences.en: She was genuinely mystified by her success.
sentences.cn: 她真的搞不懂自己为什么会成功.

sentences.en: The people seem genuinely glad to see you.
sentences.cn: 这些人见到你好像发自内心地感到喜悦。

sentences.en: They must genuinely like one another, and work well together.
sentences.cn: 他们必须真诚地喜欢对方，并且能一起有效地工作。

sentences.en: This lady was genuinely surprised at what happened to her pet.
sentences.cn: 这位女士对发生在自己宠物身上的事感到非常惊讶。

sentences.en: Tom is genuinely appreciative of all the success he's had.
sentences.cn: 汤姆为他自己获得的所有成功由衷地感激。

sentences.en: What struck me about the firm is how genuinely friendly and informal it is.
sentences.cn: 该公司的真诚、友好和不拘小节深深打动了我。

trans.tran_cn: 真地，真正地，真诚地，诚实地
